This is to inform all students that Aberdeen University has offered Scholarships to interested students who are interested.

Aberdeen University Scholarship and Admission Process is as follows;

Masters Courses offered at the university are open to all ethnic groups it is a worldwide offer.

The University of Aberdeen is always Open for students who want to apply for the ongoing scholarship

The Partial Funding rate is: £3,000.

One of the options is to Select your Perpetual Location (City/ District)

About Aberdeen Global Scholarship

Aberdeen Global Scholarship is offered for a Master’s degree in the field of Courses offered

at the University. You can as well apply for this scholarship here. The application deadline for sending your

application is always Open. This scholarship is provided by the University of Aberdeen and the

value of this studentship is a Partial Funding rate is £3,000. This scholarship is open to all.

 Degree: Masters

 Provided by: University of Aberdeen

Deadline: Always Open

Scholarship value: Partial Funding, £3,000

Location: Canada

Note: the objective of The Aberdeen University Global Scholarship is to support and embolden students

registered to study at the University.

Eligibility for The Aberdeen Global Scholarship:

  • The Aberdeen Universal Scholarship is open to all nationalities.
  • All the program-specific requirements must be met.
  • The candidate must have definitely accepted an unconditional offer from the University.
  • No application is required for this scholarship.

Value of The Aberdeen Global Scholarship

  • The successful applicants of The Aberdeen Global Scholarship will receive an amount of £3,000.
  • Deadline for The Aberdeen Global Scholarship
  • The applications for Aberdeen Global Scholarship are always open.

How to apply for Aberdeen University Scholarship and Admission

  • Goto Aberdeen University Scholarship
  • select the scholarship link
  • Fill out the required form
  • Click submit
